881070.name: Keep Defending Demo
881070.description:
The Keep Defending demo contains two levels from the first-person VR tower defense archery game.

Start your journey with the first level "Homestead" which serves as an introduction to the game.

Then try your defensive tactics in the second demo level called "Highguard". This features two stages for you to survive the enemy onslaught. Shore up your defenses with crossbows, wizards, and brave knights as you stand against hordes of enemies. Can you face the dragons and score huge bonuses?



The full game of Keep Defending includes 10 levels of intense action and overwhelming odds including Ambush (stop enemies from escaping the map) and Advance (progress through multiple stages) type levels to complement the traditional Defense levels.
